bill.title: Labor and Industrial Relations Appeals Board Proceedings
bill.description: Affirms the authority of the Labor and Industrial Relations Appeals Board to issue orders or take other appropriate action to enforce its rules and orders and allows parties to electronically file appeals to the appellate court.

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 5
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Friday, 02-01-13 8:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Hashem, Aquino, Ichiyama, Ing, Takumi, Yamashita, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Yamane.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 94), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Carroll, Har, Oshiro, Takumi excused (4).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-14-13 2:45PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cullen, Woodson.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 626), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 51).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-13-13 10:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 961) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-25-13 9:05AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 03-27-13 9:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kouchi, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) English.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1245) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-04-13.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Green, Kidani). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 444).
Transmitted to Governor.
